rows.label: tev045201_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev045201_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Selia what the Prone think of BLADE.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045201_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev045201_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Selia about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045201_JNK1010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev045201_SEL1011
rows.name: Ask Selia about the Prone's fighting style.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045201_JNK1020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev045201_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Selia about recent developments.

rows.label: tev045201_SEL1031
rows.name: Ask Selia about Zarch Quokett.

rows.label: tev045201_SEL1041
rows.name: Ask Selia about Zarch Quokett.

rows.label: tev045201_MSG0001
rows.name:
BLADEs have already toppled several Cavern Clan
fortresses.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045201_MSG0002
rows.name:
Tree Clan has battled Cavern Clan for 10,000 suns.
We know well their strength.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045201_MSG0003
rows.name:
So we also do not doubt your strength.
We know your victories were not easy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045201_MSG0004
rows.name:
But remember that we are still warriors.
We will not spend lazy days on this ship forever.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045201_MSG0005
rows.name:
Soon we will take up arms and help you bring
enemy fortress down![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045201_MSG0008
rows.name: You call beasts of Mira "indigens," yes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045201_MSG0009
rows.name:
We have been trying to tame these...indigens.
Just as we once tamed beasts of our homeworld.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045201_MSG0010
rows.name:
But we struggle. Our usual incense does not put Mira's
beasts to sleep.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045201_MSG0011
rows.name:
Yet Prone have lived and died with beasts since dawn
of time. We take pride in uncovering their weaknesses![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045201_MSG0012
rows.name:
Zarch Quokett was our homeworld's finest beastmaster.
Later I will speak with him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045201_MSG0013
rows.name:
I tried Earth weapons. I do not like them.
They are not for me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045201_MSG0018
rows.name:
Best way to fight is to tame beast.
Then let beast do fighting for you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045201_MSG0019
rows.name: I must find way to master Mira's beasts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045201_MSG0020
rows.name:
Zarch Quokett was our homeworld's finest beastmaster.
Later I will speak with him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045201_MSG0014
rows.name:
You! BLADE! We would join your ranks!
Help you fight Ganglion![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045201_MSG0015
rows.name:
Think what you could do with my power and
Noborata's wisdom![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045201_MSG0016
rows.name:
Imagine what is possible with Min'barac's
intuition and Tikotiko's money knowledge![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045201_MSG0017
rows.name:
We will be finest team in all of BLADE.
First we learn. Then we prove ourselves![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045201_MSG0022
rows.name:
I spoke with Zarch Quokett about new incense to tame
Mira's beasts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045201_MSG0023
rows.name:
His solution is quite impressive.
He is cutting-edge beastmaster![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045201_MSG0024
rows.name: One day, I will tame beast as powerful as Odsent![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045201_MSG0029
rows.name:
I spoke with Zarch Quokett about new incense to tame
Mira's beasts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045201_MSG0030
rows.name:
But his face twisted in anger and pain.
He said he threw incense away when Odsent was lost.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev045201_MSG0031
rows.name: It is sad to see great beastmaster fall so far.[ST:wait ]
